name: ProvisionEnterpriseUser
description:
Create a new SCIM enterprise user identity.

This tool creates an external identity for a new SCIM enterprise user. It's used for provisioning users in enterprises using SCIM before they can sign in through SAML. When converting an existing enterprise to use SCIM, the SCIM `userName` is utilized to match new users to existing enterprise users.

parameters.name: user_provisioning_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for the SCIM user, including active status, name, emails, externalId, roles, schemas, and userName.

active.description: Whether the user active in the IdP.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the user.

primary.description: Whether this email address is the primary address.

externalId.description: A unique identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.

familyName.description: The family name of the user.

formatted.description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display.

givenName.description: The given name of the user.

middleName.description: The middle name(s) of the user.

primary.description: Is the role a primary role for the user.

value.description: The role value representing a user role in GitHub.

roles.description: The roles assigned to the user.

schemas.description: The URIs that are used to indicate the namespaces of the SCIM schemas.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.
